question: 2|Compare the average life ladder score between Western Europe and Sub-Saharan Africa in 2021. Which region had the higher score?
query: SELECT   regional_indicator,   AVG(life_ladder) AS avg_life_ladder FROM world_happiness_report WHERE   year = 2021 GROUP BY   regional_indicator ORDER BY   avg_life_ladder DESC LIMIT 2;
answer: According to the provided data, Western Europe had an average life ladder score of 6.92 in 2021. The data does not contain information about Sub-Saharan Africa, so I am unable to compare the two regions.
